insert into FREE_BOARD (f_bo_no,f_bo_title,f_bo_content,f_bo_date,f_bo_readcount,city_no,user_id) values( #{fBoNo},#{fBoTitle}, #{fBoContent},sysdate, #{fBoCount},#{cityNo}, #{userId})

mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from free_board where f_bo_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from (select rownum idx, s.* from (select f_bo_title, f_bo_content ,f_bo_date, f_bo_readcount, city_no, user_id from free_board where f_bo_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by f_bo_no desc) s ) where idx >= #{pageStart} and idx <= #{pageEnd}
